content: Office of Strategic Initiatives, Data Analysis, Assessment, and Technology

The Office is responsible for overseeing the development of research analyses and data analytics relating to the University’s research portfolio including grants applications, awards, expenditures, as well as research activity reports, revenue projections and other related trends. This includes supporting faculty with identifying funding opportunities aligned with faculty research strengths and expertise, as well as the success rates of extramural sponsors, in order to optimize our faculty/researchers’ competitiveness and success in pursuit of extramural funding.
